welcome: I'm a beginner front-end developer, i have worked on my personal projects, and my enthusiasm to learn makes me a great fit. I am ready to put in maximum effort and succeed in web development.
description_georgia: Developed a project which showcases Georgia and it characteristics for tourists. Built using Vite + ReactJS.Implemented a design system using TailwindCSS and enhanced the user interface with features like framer-motion, gsap, and swiper. Data management was handled efficiently using Zustand.
description_vibrant: The Vibrant project is a landing page. It was built using Vite + ReactJS. Designed the project's UI system using SCSS and enhanced with libraries like a framer-motion.
alert_marvel: There is't demo version of the site, Marvel Api data is'n displayed for live versions
description_anime: The Anime project, as utilized the Jikan API, which is one of the largest mock data available. It was built using Vite + ReactTS. Designed the project's UI system using TailwindCSS. Data management was efficiently handled through Redux.
description_marvel: The Marvel project, as utilized the Marvel API, which is one of the largest mock data available. It was built using Vite + ReactJS. Designed the project's UI system using SCSS. Data management was efficiently handled through Zustand
description_namari: The Namari project is a landing page. It was built using Vite + ReactJS. Designed the project's UI system using SCSS and enhanced with libraries like a framer-motion.
description_sky_weather: The Sky Weather project is a landing page. It was built using Vite + ReactTS. Designed the project's UI system using CSS and enhanced with library like a styled component
about_description: I'm a beginner front-end developer, i have worked on my personal projects. With each project, I push my work to new horizons, always putting quality first.
learn_grow_description: Ready to continually expand knowledge and skills, actively exploring new technologies and development methods to achieve high performance in work.
hardworking_reliable_description: When I take on a task, I give it my all. You can count on me to get things done well and on time, taking full responsibility for the quality of my work.
driven_succeed_description: I'm motivated by achieving my goals and seeing tangible results. I approach my work creatively and plan effectively to make sure I deliver the best outcomes possible.
